title: New: Noble Oak – Fast Summer
content:
Vancouver producer Noble Oak is rapidly becoming one of my favourite new artists around.

His No Bloke EP wowed me last year, and his couple of tracks so far from 2012 have set the bar even higher. Since deciding to use his own vocals amongst his mesmerizing glo-fi productions, his work has taken on a whole new transcendental level. Fast Summer is a self-described ‘dream and bass’ number, yet it’s far more beautiful than that genre suggests. Check out Fast Summer below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
